@graph.name: Vegan Minestrone Soup - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: This vegan minestrone soup with white beans is perfect for cold winter days! It's super easy to make, incredibly healthy, and comforting!

@graph.headline: Vegan Minestrone Soup
@graph.keywords: minestrone recipe,minestrone soup,minestrone soup recipe,vegan minestrone,vegan minestrone soup,vegetable minestrone,vegetable minestrone soup,vegetarian minestrone soup

@graph.name: Vegan Minestrone Soup
@graph.description: This vegan minestrone soup with white beans is perfect for cold winter days! It's super easy to make, incredibly healthy, and comforting!
recipeIngredient: 4 stalks of celery, cut into rings
2 cups small pasta shapes like small shells
2 teaspoons dried herbs de Provence or any other Mediterranean spice blend (like thyme,basil, rosemary, and oregano)

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the pasta according to the instructions on the package. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Prepare the pasta according to the instructions on the package. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat some oil in a large pot and sauté the onion for about 2 minutes. Then add the garlic for another minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat some oil in a large pot and sauté the onion for about 2 minutes. Then add the garlic for another minute.

recipeInstructions.text: After one more minute, add the leek and then the carrots, the celery, and the zucchini. Cook for about 2-3 minutes, then stir in one teaspoon of the Mediterranean spice blend.
recipeInstructions.name: After one more minute, add the leek and then the carrots, the celery, and the zucchini. Cook for about 2-3 minutes, then stir in one teaspoon of the Mediterranean spice blend.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the vegetable broth. Add the diced tomatoes and stir well with a wooden spoon.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the vegetable broth. Add the diced tomatoes and stir well with a wooden spoon.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook on low heat for about 10 minutes. Season with salt, pepper, fresh oregano, and the remaining spices.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook on low heat for about 10 minutes. Season with salt, pepper, fresh oregano, and the remaining spices.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cooked pasta and the beans and allow to heat through.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the cooked pasta and the beans and allow to heat through.
